data.proxyObjectName: acoustic dreadnought guitar with natural wood finish and black pickguard
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the neck near its midpoint and swing the lower bout forward to tap an imaginary nail (not sure whether it is applicable)

data.proxyObjectName: white modern desk lamp with circular base
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap your hand around the vertical stem just above the base and move it in slashing motions
Grip the handle in the middle with a firm wrap of fingers and thumb, then lift and rotate it in the air
Hold the tube near its midpoint with a power grip and move it forward and backward in a single straight path while keeping it pressed lightly against the tabletop

data.proxyObjectName: green bag of Lay’s Sour Cream & Onion chips
data.utilizationMethod: Lay the unopened bag flat on the table, logo side up. Smooth the surface with your palm, then glide the straw tip across the taut plastic front.
Grip the straw near its midpoint with thumb, index, and middle finger and execute delicate strokes identical to a paintbrush handle
Pinch the cup’s rim between thumb and index finger and squeeze the thin plastic wall until it flexes inward, then release to let it spring back

data.proxyObjectName: blue upholstered two-seater sofa with black metal armrests
data.utilizationMethod: Press palm into the seat cushion and release to feel the rebound

data.proxyObjectName: gray and white camouflage-patterned game controller
data.utilizationMethod: Wrap the right hand around the controller’s right grip and rest the index finger on the right trigger; squeeze and release the trigger for each shutter activation
Place both palms on opposite edges of the plate rim and turn the plate 90° while keeping it parallel to the table surface
With one hand resting palm-down on the tabletop, glide fingertips along the banana’s outer curve from tip toward stem, then back again in a single continuous stroke
Rest your palm on the suitcase’s spring-loaded carry handle and press downward until the handle seats against the case
